rules_text:
When this permanent enters, draw a card.
Splice onto creature {2}{U} [i](As you cast a creature spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card’s effects to that spell.)[/i]
Splice onto cryptid creature {U} [i](Aliens, Eldrazi, Horrors, and Mutants are cryptids.)[/i]
notes:
Inspiration — Third eye/secret limbs/body parts

Mechanical Uniqueness — Splicing onto permanent spells

**Designer’s note: Changed cheaper splice from just mutants to all cryptids.
